author: szetszwo
msg: MAPREDUCE-2797. Update mapreduce tests and RAID for HDFS-2239.

author: mattmann
msg: OODT-207: update Weditor to handle condition timeouts

author: jeremias
msg: Added a new clean-room decoder implementation of the CCITT Group3 1D (T.4) compression algorithm.
Now using the new decoder in the CCITTFaxDecodeFilter when handling Group2 1D data.
Added new IOUtils class to reduce code duplication for I/O-related operations (since we don't use Apache Commons IO, yet).

Changed the way a BufferedImage is constructed from CCITT images. The former approach did not always paint the image in PDF2Image. I haven't found why this happens. The new approach is probably a bit slower but also safer.
Reduced the amount of buffering when handling CCITT images a bit.
